casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Joel Eusevio DAVIS, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 156406
COA: 332081 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 15, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing his supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before September 14, 2018.
